title: Ronald James WILLIAMS
content:
Share article  
  WILLIAMS Ronald James On 7th September, at the Royal Gwent Hospital, Newport, Ronald James, aged 83 years, of Bigstone Grove, Tutshill. Beloved husband of Eileen, dearly loved dad of Jane and Will and grandad of Ben, loved by all his family. Funeral Service Tuesday 22nd September, 1.30 p.m. at the Forest of Dean Crematorium. Family flowers only, donations for St. David's Hospice Care may be sent to Philip Blatchly & Son, 5 Station Road, Chepstow, Mon. NP16 5PA. TEL: 01291 624939
